articles.title: WHO rolls out plan to rid world of cervical cancer, saving millions of lives - UN News
articles.description: The World Health Organization (WHO) set out a strategy on Tuesday for eliminating cervical cancer, which would avoid the death of an estimated five million women and girls from the disease, by 2050.
articles.content: Eliminating any cancer would have once seemed an impossible dream, but we now have the cost-effective, evidence-based tools to make that dream a reality, WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyes… [+2304 chars]
